node.excerpt: I’ve continued my work on my UDP AIR native extension, to add support for Android. I’m happy to release version 0.2, which adds Android support :-) This means, from now on, you can send / receive UDP packets in your AIR mobile projects on both iOS & Android. If you find any bugs, or have suggestions…

frontmatter.title: UDP Native Extension for AIR Mobile – now with Android Support!

node.excerpt: update: added Android support to the extension. When you’re using a mobile device as a controller for an application or a game, you’ll want fast data transfers. Classic TCP/IP traffic over sockets is a bit slow, due to the nature of TCP/IP (packets are delivered in the correct order, the receiver…

frontmatter.title: UDP in AIR for iOS using a native extension
